TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. Now there is a multigigaton antimatter charge, and you are the guardian. You force everybody to start not warring, otherwise you burst the planet, but you have to press button every hour 24/7.

I wish for relevant reliable reality, replying on relay requests reasonably.

Edited August 1, 2020 by kerbiloid

Granted, nothing happens because I'm confused.

I wish for less alliteration.

Granted you can't say any alliteration anymore

I wish for an uncorruptable KSP 2 finished game that cannot be destroyed or ruined or glitched for at least a year and I am able to play it for that time.

Granted. The KSP2 console is the only working thing in your atomic shelter.

I wish this rainy weather all the day and preferrably tomorrow.

Granted. The rainy weather is on the other side of the globe.

I wish to know all the planets and moons in KSP 2 (without loosing the ability to visit them).

Edited August 2, 2020 by Guest

Granted, you could visit them, if the system wasnt rss scale.

I wish the annoying fly in my room would go away.

Edited August 3, 2020 by catloaf

Granted. Accidentally, you've broken the fly of the window, and it's gone.

I wish the annoying mosquito(s) in my room is already poisoned with fumigator, so I can go and switch it off.

Granted. The fumigator was connected to your life force, so when you turned it off you died instantly.

I wish that my KSP would load faster.

3 minutes ago, DunaManiac said:

I wish that my KSP would load faster.

Granted. Your Gamedata folder disappears and your game loads up REALLY FAST.

I wish for honest politicians (Long shot here).

Granted. Now you know the truth and wish to unknow it back.

I wish GPL license was defeated, cursed, and forgotten for the sake of MIT, Apache, and other good and fair licenses.

7 hours ago, kerbiloid said:

Granted. Now you know the truth and wish to unknow it back.

May I say that's beautiful.

7 hours ago, kerbiloid said:

I wish GPL license was defeated, cursed, and forgotten for the sake of MIT, Apache, and other good and fair licenses.

Granted, the other licences where part of the forgotten, defeated and cursed,

I wish to be ability to visit all the new planets in KSP 2 (without loosing the chance to visit them again or loosing the chance of playing KSP 2.)

Granted, but you have to sign a terms of service that gives T2 the rights to hack your computer, your bank accout, and your forum account.

I wish it was Friday.

Granted. It was, three days ago.

I wish today they will bring the test pad.

Granted they brought it back quickly afterwords

I wish for another bright comet to pass by and I am able to witness it for a while

Granted,looks like it's just a De-orbiting Starlink satellite,not a comet after all.

i Wish the Titan IV rockets were still in service.

Granted, but they are re retired after a few failed launches.

I wish that Earth has another moon, preferably with an atmosphere. And a surface pressure equivalent to Mars, but planes can fly due to low gravity.

Granted,It only appears on KSP as a DLC(cost 15$),with RSS and Kopernicus Installed,not in the Real life.

I wish The MIR Space Station never De-orbited.

Granted, the Russians use the MIR station to destroy the ISS, and declare war in space. And due to the Americans' weak missile system ('cause to budget cuts), Russia rules space forever.

I wish that SpaceX and the US military switched funding.

Granted. Now US military accept commercial orders.

I wish for KSP and X-37B cooperation for new parts.

Granted, but then Boeing sues SQUAD and claims KSP as it's property and destroys the game for everyone.

I wish for all space agencies to be required to give at least one rocket design to KSP to put into the game.

Granted,they're available on a new KSP DLC!

i wish Roscosmos made a Launch vehicle capable to push Huge Payloads in a orbit Around the Moon

Edited August 4, 2020 by Kane Kerman
Where did everyone go?

Granted. Moon falls.

I wish Moon had a submoon.

Granted,NASA Mistaked it as an Dangerous asteroid and Redirects it to Mars...

I wish The Cassini-Huygens SpaceCraft was still in Service.

Granted, when the aliens come, they find Cassini first, and upgrade it along with other probes they found to become destroyers of Earth.

I wish for something interesting to happen.

Granted,Something Interesting will happen until the N1 Rocket Succesfully Makes it to the moon.

I wish i could stop Talking on the Forum Games.
